profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs
products: Interior Painting,Exterior Painting,Residential Painting and Commercial Painting,Staircase refinishing, Condo or Apartment Renovations and Handyman Services, Kitchen Design and Build, Home Additions, Structural work, Garage Design and Build, Basement Renovations, Bathroom Renovations, Basement Underpinning and Waterproofing,Custom Cabinetry, Flooring Installation including, Laminate, Hardwood, Engineered, Tiles, Including Porcelain, marble and granite. We also have Master Electricians, Master Plumbers and Gas and HVAC members as a part of our team.
services: House Painters, Office Painting, Exterior Painting, Residential Painting, Wallpaper Installation & Removal, Stucco Removal, Drywall Installation and Plaster repairs, Paint & Wallpaper Retailer save up to 50% off, Demolition, Rough and Finished Carpentry, Home and Renovation advisors, Kitchen Planning and Design, Handyman and Painter for a Day Services, Deck Design and Build, Basement renovations, general contractors
brands: Benjamin Moore, Dulux Paint, and Sherwin Williams. We Believe in not Including Paint and providing you our wholesale Paint Pricing as many of our Competitors include paint in your pricing and then substitute low grade paint. We believe in provide you the best paint for your home and to provide access to our unbelievable wholesale pricing.
specialities: Custom painting, Stucco removal, staircase refinishing and rebuilding,wallpaper installation, wallpaper removal, handyman services, home renovations including bathroom renovations, basement renovations & condo and apartment renovations. Plus our Award Winning Painter and Handyman for a Day Services. Our Painting Services including Kitchen Cabinet Painting and Spraying are specialties. Kitchen Design Services and Complete Kitchen Design, Build and Installation.
payment_method: Cash, Cheques, Email Transfers, all Major Credit Cards
diplomas: Open 7 Days a Week Call  or emailNow
licenses: City of Toronto & Other Muncipalities in the GTA

profile:
Maestro Mouldings is a Toronto based mouldings installation and interior painting company that provides service all throughout the GTA, North York, Thornhill, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Woodbridge, Maple, Brampton, Mississauga, Etobicoke, Scarborough, Markham, Pickering, Ajax, Oakville, Aurora, Newmarket, and Barrie.
Maestro Mouldings specializes in installing crown mouldings, flexible mouldings, wainscoting, baseboards, casings, medallions, columns and coffered ceilings.
WE CAN MATCH ANY PRICE FOR ANY OF OUR SERVICES.

A Maestro is a great or distinguished figure in any sphere. In the field of home decor, we are truly the maestros that bring you quality, originality, and monumental mastery.

Maestro Mouldings was established out of our devotion to excellence, perfection, and superior craftsmanship. Simply put, we stand out from our competitors because we love what we do and we do it with a passion!

With many years of experience under our tool belt, we offer our services to our clients in all three sectors: residential, commercial, and corporate.

Because we are confident that you will be pleased with our services and results, we extend a 100% satisfaction guarantee.
Not to mention the fact that we can beat any price on the market.
No wonder we are used to standing ovations!

profile:
Miskas Wood Products Inc is a family owned wholesaler which now sells Pine Mouldings and other wood products directly to the public. We’ve got years of experience in the manufacturing industry and our products are used and trusted by contractors all over Canada.

We like to make things easy for our customers; Most of our trim & moulding range is available unprimed, primed and even painted for your installation convenience.

We do everything under one roof. We chop, finger joint and mill. By keeping all our operations under one roof, we can double check for quality throughout the entire manufacturing process.
products:
Primed and/or Painted Trim & Mouldings - Finger-Jointed White Pine Products :          

Baseboards - Casings - Crown Moulding - Chair Rail - Panel Mould - Doorstops - Backband - Shiplap (Paint Grade) - Tongue & Groove (Paint Grade) - Knotty Pine T&G - Wood Pillars - Fiberglass Columns
specialities: Specializing in Manufacturing 100% North American White Pine Trim and Mouldings Products.
name: Miskas Wood Products Inc.

profile:
Accent Walls Canada specializes in installation of all trim work in your home, from accent walls to waffle ceilings.

We are thrilled when clients bring in their design ideas  and we work together to make sure that their ideas become a reality.

We concentrate on quality rather than speed and our job is not done unless you are fully satisfied.



Our success is measured in knowing that we helped you find joy to relax, to be with loved ones, and to entertain in your newly renovated home.

profile:
Easy House Construction Inc. Is a finish carpentry and painting company in GTA.

North till newmarket, south till Toronto, west till Oakville, east till Oshawa.

We pride ourselves on offering low costs to our customers with professional, experienced skills and knowledge in the extremely competitive industry since 2015. Our accomplishments are embodied in successful projects completed to date and client testimonials to back them up.


Interior Installation services including 

-crown moulding 

-wainscoting （panel wall）

- coffered ceiling

-baseboard

-interior doors

-accent wall 

-door casing 

-shiplap

-door windows build up

profile:
Flex Designs creates custom designs tailored to your specific needs, making sure your house stands out from all the other boring houses on the market. We specialize in professional installation of crown moulding, wainscotting, baseboards, doors and casings. We also offer coffered and waffle ceiling design installation service. Flex designs is committed to offering every customer differentiated design and customer experience. Our team is professional, creative and extremely attentive to details. 
Call us to get your free estimate today!

profile:
FREE IN HOME ESTIMATE.

Welcome to Preciso Interior Trim, where quality craftsmanship guarantees a beautiful result every time. 

Whether you are embarking on a single-room makeover or a full renovation, our dedicated team will add quality work and materials to your next home project. 

We design and install trim/moldings, doors and hardware in residential homes and commercial spaces. 

We’ve successfully worked alongside various home builders throughout the GTA on new home projects for the last 10 years. 

Experts in trim design. We specialize in: Baseboard, Window/Door Casing, Wainscoting/Panelling, Crown Molding, Crown Molding for cove lighting, Columns, Waffle Ceiling(Oak and Stucco), Doors and Stairway trim. We provide personalised customer service. 

Evan Nissan (Trim Specialist) will come out personally to assess the scope of work. We do not subcontract out.

Our team will help bring your vision to life by creating dramatic impact and adding personality and distinction to your home.
